meta.hint:
A compound word is made from two smaller words. Example - snow + man = snowman
If you don't know the meaning of a compound word, look at the two smaller words. They can help you understand the meaning. A snowman is a man made out of snow.
meta.question: Find the odd one out from the group of words.

content.description:
Type the compound word to complete the sentence.
The stick part of a match is the ____stick
content.extra: keyboard as in spelling to choose letters.
